title: why i can't buy RP ?????
body: *  EVERY time I try use my credit card (wells fargo ) to buy Some RP it gives me a massege said (you have exceeded the maximum number of attempts at this time . please wait 24 hours and try again later ) I wait 2 DAYS and still give me the same massege please I need help there is skin on sale I need to buy it and i am using visa purchase method please i need to fix this problem

replies.body: We'd like to help you out with this individually.  Hit us up by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can respond as soon as possible.  Looking forward assisting!
